page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT AT POYNTINGTON
page.content: The 14 farmers with varying sizes of farms are{self_employed}with few employees,plus contractual labour and part_timers.Other self_employed people are caterers,a novelist,film producer and photograper.Many residents travel by car to work in nearby Sherborne, Yeovil,Wincanton choosing to live in the country.{They work as}aircraft, telephone or refrigeration engineers, sales representatives,milk_man,doctor, architect,auctioneer,accountant,contr_ act office cleaner,computer programmer and welder.Few married women work full time but some take part_time clerical/ home help/shop assistant posts nearby. Another group gives regular time to responsible{voluntary work}e.g.Save the Children Fund,Dr Barnardo's, B.R.C.S. ,Women's Royal Voluntary Ser_ vice.To the best of our knowledge no one is{unemployed}exept by choice.
